column1: Gaia Data and RVs for Candidate epsilonCA Members
^a M+13 bona fide members are indicated by dagger, M+13 provisional members are indicated by Dagger, M+13 rejected members are indicated by *, and GF18 members are indicated by #.
^b Values marked with + have high astrometric excess noise.

^c References for radial velocities: (1) Desidera et al. (2015), (2) Gaia Collaboration et al. (2018), (3) Gontcharov (2006), (4) Grady et al. (2004), (5) Guenther et al. (2007), (6) Lopez Marti et al. (2013), (7) Malo et al. (2014), (8) Murphy et al. (2013), (9) Kordopatis et al. (2013), (10) Schisano et al. (2009), (11) Terranegra et al. (1999), (12) Torres et al. (2006).
